description: Overly permissive CORS: Access-Control-Allow-Origin set to '*' when toggle enabled
Debug mode leaks auth context and headers in API response when toggle enabled
Secrets logged to console (service role key) when toggle enabled
Over-privileged anon key usage: anon key used as bearer token in requests to Edge Functions
Audit logs RLS policy allows any authenticated user to read operational logs (auth.uid() is not null)
